data.prayer: Lord, make the 16,569 believers in Bhadrak to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 1,489,730 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bhadrak, Odisha, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Bhadrak prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the county of Bhadrak, Odisha, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Bhadrak against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Bhadrak, Odisha, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Bhadrak, Odisha, India a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Bhadrak access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

location.name: Bhadrak
location.people_groups_list: Tulabhina, Brahmin Jyoti, Sitaria, Guria, Sanei
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tulabhina (11,000), Brahmin Jyoti (128,000), Sitaria (900), Guria (730,000), Sanei (1,100)
